comment:
* Result of lock screen credentials verification.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: RESULT_LOCKOUT
variables.comment:
* The operation was canceled because the API is locked out due to too many attempts. It
     * usually happens after 5 failed attempts and API may be called again after a short
     * delay specified by {@code getTimeoutMillis}.

variables.name: RESULT_NO_REMAINING_ATTEMPTS
variables.comment: * There were too many invalid guesses.

variables.name: RESULT_SESSION_EXPIRED
variables.comment: * New lockscreen validation session is required to verify guess.

methods.name: public long getTimeoutMillis()
methods.comment:
* Delay before next attempt to verify credentials.
     *
     * Default value is {@code 0}.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel out, int flags)
